root.message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 8-10-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data sources

Description:

The indicators in the FAS database are collected on an annual basis since 2009, covering the period 2004-2018. Information is collected from Central Banks or other main financial regulators for 189 countries.

All data and metadata are available free of charge to the public on the IMF’s FAS website, along with other key documents.
